definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Seriously? I thought. Condoms for kids?
sentences.chinese: 此话当真？我在想。孩子用的安全套？

sentences.english: We can't take you seriously when you just bandy words.
sentences.chinese: 当你们仅仅是互相斗嘴时我们不能当真。

sentences.english: Would you take a guy seriously if he wore shorts to the office?
sentences.chinese: 一个穿着短裤在办公室里的男人，你会把他当真吗？

sentences.english: And of course, no one took him seriously.
Pious Master Dimmesdale! can this be you?
sentences.chinese: 虔诚的丁梅斯代尔牧师，难道当真是你吗？

sentences.english: And if you really enjoy a tip?
sentences.chinese: 你当真非常喜欢这个建议么？

sentences.english: LAURA: We handled all the advertising and promotion for the Fair.
sentences.chinese: 我们当真万博会扫数的告白与宣传促销。

sentences.english: My curse Shu really is that does the white do?
sentences.chinese: 我的诅咒术当真是白练的吗？

sentences.english: If anybody really believed the things I did on stage, they wouldn't clap, they'd scream.
sentences.chinese: 如果大家把我的表演当真，就不会鼓掌，只会尖叫。

sentences.english: They love to boast, though often with tongue in cheek. P. 3
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢吹嘘自诩，尽管往往是半开玩笑，不可当真。

sentences.english: What he said was just rant . Don't take it seriously.
sentences.chinese: 他所说的是夸夸其谈，不要当真。

sentences.english: The crowd laughed, but the president was serious.
sentences.chinese: 观众笑了起来，可总统却是当真的。

sentences.english: The 21st century, can I take it seriously as Shamo?
sentences.chinese: 21世纪里，能把我当真看成傻冒吗？

sentences.english: If the Senator really used the best security outfitters, that doesn't seem likely.
sentences.chinese: 如果议员当真装配了最先进的保安系统，就不会那样。

sentences.english: Is difficult don't transform him truly is what steel does?
sentences.chinese: 难不成他当真是铁做的？

sentences.english: If this be the case, he deserves you.
sentences.chinese: 当真这样，他的确配得上你。

definition: really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...
can it be possible that/could it be
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
